channel.title: dfg on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in dfg on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How to bridge $DFG from Ethereum Mainnet to Base Network for staking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: $DFG is a token that represents the shares of Dwarves Foundation for Dwarves and active contributors of our communitiy. Dwarves team introduced a program to help $DFG holders earn $USDC from staking $DFG on Base.

item.title: How to earn reward from staking DFG
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This guide will show you how to use $DFG staking to earn $USDC, cool merch, and more. You’ll need a computer with a browser.

item.title: How to set up crypto wallet to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: To withdraw ICY to Vietnam Bank or other fiat, you need set up 2 types of wallet in advance. On-chain wallet (Non-custodial wallet, such as: Coinbase, Metamask): This kind of wallet is needed to receive ICY and swap ICY to USDT.

item.title: How to withdraw ICY
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you can withdraw ICY, please make sure that you have already had the crypto wallet and Binance wallet. If you don’t have any, please follow this guideline.

item.title: $icy in 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Follow up on our recent post df protocol, $icy and $dfg. Since 2020, $icy has been a part of our workflow.
